db2/instance/username.description: Username for the DB2 instance owner.

db2/instance/password.description: Password for the DB2 instance owner.

db2/instance/group.description: Primary Group for the DB2 instance owner.

db2/das/username.description: Username for the DB2 das owner.

db2/das/password.description: Password for the DB2 das owner.

db2/das/group.description: Primary Group for the DB2 das owner.

db2/fenced/username.description: Username for the DB2 fenced owner.

db2/fenced/password.description: Password for the DB2 fenced owner.

db2/fenced/group.description: Primary Group for the DB2 fenced owner.

db2/data_path.description: The location on disk where the DB2 Data Directory will be installed.

db2/system.description: The name of the DB2 system.
